subject: Add AI Image Prompt Helper to Media tab
body:
Adds a collapsible section (collapsed by default) to help users generate
prompts for AI image generation tools. Features:

- Subject/context description input
- Style options (Photo, Cinematic, Editorial, Minimal, Abstract, etc.)
- Mood/lighting options (Dark, Light, Neutral, Dramatic, Soft, Warm, Cool)
- Image purpose toggle (Hero Image vs Background for text overlays)
- Color options (use current theme colors or custom description)
- Auto-detected format from selected platform (orientation, aspect ratio)
- Generated prompt always includes "no text/overlays" constraints
- Copy button with visual feedback

Also updates USER_GUIDE.md with documentation for the new feature.
